mapper.sql: id, stu_id, pay_master_id, stage_date, stage_fee, stage_status, pos_real, cash_real, check_real, remit_real, pay_date, create_time, creator, update_time, updator, remark, create_type, company_id
mapper.select: select from student_fee_stage
select count(id) from student_fee_stage

when.test: applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_OFFLINE'

choose.when: select a.* from (select distinct p.id as payMasterId,p.item_one_id as itemOneId,p.school_id as schoolId,p.item_one_name as itemOneName,p.item_second_id as itemSecondId,p.item_second_name itemSecondName,p.exam_term_id as examTermId,p.exam_term_name as examTermName,p.commodity_id as classTypeId,p.class_type_name as classTypeName,p.apply_time as applyTime, TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time) as timeLen, p.campus_id as campusId, p.class_type_hour as classTypeHour,p.apply_channel_code as applyChannelCode,p.updator,p.pay_status_code as payStatusCode,p.total_amount as totalAmount, p.training_fee as trainingFee ,p.exam_agent_fee as examAgentFee ,p.offer_amount as offerAmount,p.is_agent as isAgent,p.is_agent_material_complete as isAgentMaterialComplete,p.payment_type_code as paymentTypeCode, s.id as stuId ,s.name as stuName,s.age,s.sex,s.mobile,s.identity_id as identityId ,f.id as stageId,f.pay_date as payDate,f.stage_date as stageDate,f.stage_fee as stageFee,f.stage_status as stageStatus,f.pos_real as posReal,f.check_real as checkReal,f.remit_real as remitReal,f.cash_real as cashReal,-1 as payMethod,uf.username from student_fee_stage f left join student_pay_master p on f.pay_master_id=p.id LEFT JOIN student s on f.stu_id=s.id left join users_front uf on s.user_id= uf.id where f.stage_status='1' and f.del_flag=0 and (p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') and p.commodity_type='COMMODITY_CLASS' and p.delete_flag=0 and p.apply_channel_code='CHANNEL_OFFLINE' and p.item_one_Id = #{itemOneId} and s.company_id = #{companyId} and p.school_id = #{schoolId} and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startDate}' and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endDate}' and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time)<=#{timeLen} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}) a group by payMasterId

when.test: applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_ONLINE'

choose.when: select a.* from ( select distinct p.id as payMasterId,p.item_one_id as itemOneId,p.school_id as schoolId,p.item_one_name as itemOneName,p.item_second_id as itemSecondId,p.item_second_name itemSecondName,p.exam_term_id as examTermId,p.exam_term_name as examTermName,p.commodity_id as classTypeId,p.class_type_name as classTypeName,p.apply_time as applyTime, TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time) as timeLen, p.campus_id as campusId, p.class_type_hour as classTypeHour,p.apply_channel_code as applyChannelCode,p.updator,p.pay_status_code as payStatusCode,p.total_amount as totalAmount, p.training_fee as trainingFee ,p.exam_agent_fee as examAgentFee ,p.offer_amount as offerAmount,p.is_agent as isAgent,p.is_agent_material_complete as isAgentMaterialComplete,p.payment_type_code as paymentTypeCode, s.id as stuId ,s.name as stuName,s.age,s.sex,s.mobile,s.identity_id as identityId ,po.id as stageId,po.order_time as payDate,-1 as stageDate,po.pay_price as stageFee,-1 as stageStatus, -1 as posReal,-1 as checkReal,-1 as remitReal,-1 as cashReal,po.pay_type as payMethod,uf.username from pay_order po left join student_pay_master p on po.id=p.pay_order_id LEFT JOIN student s on p.stu_id=s.id left join users_front uf on s.user_id= uf.id where (p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') and p.commodity_type='COMMODITY_CLASS' and p.delete_flag=0 and p.apply_channel_code='CHANNEL_ONLINE' and p.item_one_Id = #{itemOneId} and s.company_id = #{companyId} and p.school_id = #{schoolId} and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startDate}' and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endDate}' and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time)<=#{timeLen} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}) a group by payMasterId

when.test: applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_STUDYCARD'

choose.when: select a.* from ( select distinct p.id as payMasterId,p.item_one_id as itemOneId,p.school_id as schoolId,p.item_one_name as itemOneName,p.item_second_id as itemSecondId,p.item_second_name itemSecondName,p.exam_term_id as examTermId,p.exam_term_name as examTermName,p.commodity_id as classTypeId,p.class_type_name as classTypeName,p.apply_time as applyTime, TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time) as timeLen, p.campus_id as campusId, p.class_type_hour as classTypeHour,p.apply_channel_code as applyChannelCode,p.updator,p.pay_status_code as payStatusCode,p.total_amount as totalAmount, p.training_fee as trainingFee ,p.exam_agent_fee as examAgentFee ,p.offer_amount as offerAmount,p.is_agent as isAgent,p.is_agent_material_complete as isAgentMaterialComplete,p.payment_type_code as paymentTypeCode, s.id as stuId ,s.name as stuName,s.age,s.sex,s.mobile,s.identity_id as identityId ,po.id as stageId,po.order_time as payDate,-1 as stageDate,po.pay_price as stageFee,-1 as stageStatus, -1 as posReal,-1 as checkReal,-1 as remitReal,-1 as cashReal,po.pay_type as payMethod,uf.username from pay_order po left join student_pay_master p on po.id=p.pay_order_id LEFT JOIN student s on p.stu_id=s.id left join users_front uf on s.user_id= uf.id where (p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or p.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') and p.commodity_type='COMMODITY_CLASS' and p.delete_flag=0 and p.apply_channel_code='CHANNEL_STUDYCARD' and p.item_one_Id = #{itemOneId} and s.company_id = #{companyId} and p.school_id = #{schoolId} and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startDate}' and date_format(p.apply_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endDate}' and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(p.apply_time)<=#{timeLen} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}) a group by payMasterId

when.test: applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_OFFLINE'
applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_ONLINE'
applyChannelCode != null and applyChannelCode != '' and applyChannelCode=='CHANNEL_STUDYCARD'

mapper.select: SELECT s.stu_id stuId,s.pay_master_id payMasterId,sum(s.stage_fee) cntFee,(select count(id) from student_fee_stage where stu_id=s.stu_id and pay_master_id=s.pay_master_id) cntNum,company_id as companyId FROM student_fee_stage s WHERE s.stage_status = 0 and s.company_id=#{companyId} GROUP BY s.stu_id, s.pay_master_id

SELECT p.id as payMasterId,p.item_one_id as itemOneId,p.item_one_name as itemOneName,p.item_second_id as itemSecondId,p.item_second_name itemSecondName,p.exam_term_id as examTermId,p.exam_term_name as examTermName,p.commodity_id as classTypeId,p.class_type_name as classTypeName,p.apply_time as applyTime, p.campus_id as campusId, p.class_type_hour as classTypeHour,p.updator,p.pay_status_code as payStatusCode,p.total_amount as totalAmount, p.training_fee as trainingFee ,p.exam_agent_fee as examAgentFee ,p.offer_amount as offerAmount,p.is_agent as isAgent,p.is_agent_material_complete as isAgentMaterialComplete,p.payment_type_code as paymentTypeCode, s.id as stuId ,s.name as stuName,s.age,s.sex,s.mobile,s.identity_id as identityId ,f.id as stageId,f.pay_date as payDate,f.stage_date as stageDate,f.stage_fee as stageFee,f.stage_status as stageStatus,(select count(id)+1 from student_fee_stage where stu_id=#{stuId} and pay_master_id=#{payMasterId} and stage_status=1 ) currtNum from student_fee_stage f left join student_pay_master p on f.pay_master_id=p.id LEFT JOIN student s on f.stu_id=s.id where f.stu_id=#{stuId} and f.pay_master_id=#{payMasterId} and stage_status=0 and f.company_id=#{companyId} ORDER BY f.id LIMIT 1

select count(*) from (SELECT stu_id stuId,pay_master_id payMasterId,sum(stage_fee) cntFee,count(id) cntNum FROM student_fee_stage WHERE stage_status = 0 and company_id=#{companyId} GROUP BY stu_id, pay_master_id) c limit 1

SELECT FROM student_fee_stage WHERE stu_id = ( SELECT stu_id FROM student_fee_stage WHERE id = #{id}) AND pay_master_id = ( SELECT pay_master_id FROM student_fee_stage WHERE id = #{id}) AND stage_status=0 AND id>#{id} limit 1
select from student_fee_stage where pay_master_id=#{payMasterId} and stage_status='0' and del_flag='0'
select from student_fee_stage where pay_master_id=#{payMasterId}
select from student_fee_stage where pay_master_id=#{payMasterId} and stage_status=1 and del_flag='0'
select sum(stage_fee) from student_fee_stage where pay_master_id=#{payMasterId} and stage_status=1
mapper.update: update student_fee_stage set stu_id=#{stuId} where pay_master_id=#{id}
update student_fee_stage set del_flag=1 where pay_master_id=#{payMasterId}
mapper.select: select s.id as payId,s.exam_term_id as examTermId,s.exam_term_name as examTermName,s.item_one_id as itemOneId,s.item_one_name as itemOneName, s.item_second_id as itemSecondId,s.item_second_name as itemSecondName, s.commodity_id as classTypeId,s.class_type_name as classTypeName,s.school_id as schoolId,s.company_id as companyId, s.total_amount as totalFee,p.id as id,p.payoff_fee as hasPayFee,p.payoff_percent as payoffPercent,p.payoff_status AS payoffStatus from student_pay_master s LEFT JOIN class_type c on s.commodity_id=c.id LEFT JOIN course_remote_payoff p on s.commodity_id=p.class_type_id where c.remote_flag=1 and s.delete_flag=0 and c.del_flag=0 and (s.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or s.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or s.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or s.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') and s.commodity_type='COMMODITY_CLASS' and s.id=#{payId} limit 1
